name: Everyday House Tamagotchi
description:
'Everday House Tamagotchi' (otherwise known as おうち まいにち たまごっ; Ouchi Mainichi Tamagotchi) is a Tamagotchi game developed by Bandai Namco Games for the Nintendo 3DS. It was released only in Japan on November 22nd, 2012. It features both original toyline and animated characters from the 'Tamagotchi!' series. It is the second of six Tamagotchi 3DS entries.

*Ouchi Mainichi Tamagotchi is a virtual life game in which players own and customize a Tamagotchi dollhouse, and look after Tamagotchi "dolls" by playing a variety of minigames. At first, there are only a few rooms and 8 characters, but more rooms, house colors, furniture, and characters are unlocked as the game progresses. The player earns money by playing minigames and doing other chores like taking out the trash or fishing in the koi pond. The player can then use the money to buy more furniture, wallpapers, floors, and characters. The player can change the colors of the house whenever they want, and they can also place the Tamagotchis anywhere they want in the house.

(*Source of Description - 'Tamagotchi Fandom Wiki'; 'Ouchi Mainichi Tamagotchi')
